sentences.sContent: But the eighth most-important invention of all time?
sentences.sCn: 真的是整个时代第八项最重要的发明吗？

sentences.sContent: When her eighth child was still an infant, she became pregnant again.
sentences.sCn: 当她第八个孩子还是小婴儿的时候，她又怀孕了。

sentences.sContent: On my eighth day at Bastion, preparing to leave, I witness one last trauma. A British soldier is brought in by Chinook and transferred to the operating room, his lower right leg blown off by an IED.
sentences.sCn: 到达基地的第八天，我正准备离开，目击了最后一件让人心碎的场景，一架支努干送来一名英国士兵，转移他到手术室做手术，他的右小腿被简易炸弹炸飞。

trans.tranOther: coming after seven other things in a series
